*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Elias R. Wightman, November 8, 1830. Surveying Instructions.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-08-1830">Novr 8. 1830*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**location_mentioned*Mr Weightman*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*The *person_mentioned*heirs of Richard Graves*/person_mentioned* have petitioned for the *location_mentioned*29 League on the side of Trespalacios Bayou*/location_mentioned*, it is the next *location_mentioned*League above the one selected by *person_mentioned*Partin*/person_mentioned**/location_mentioned*, and I wish the returns of all that *location_mentioned*Creek */location_mentioned*as soon as you can send them *person_mentioned*James Moore*/person_mentioned* will pay the surveying*person_mentioned* J. H. Scott*/person_mentioned* has selected a *location_mentioned*quarter on the west side of Trespalacios below where the new road to La Baca crosses*/location_mentioned*—and *person_mentioned*John T. Brush*/person_mentioned* a *location_mentioned*quarter from the forks of a branch that comes into Trespalacios a little below the road*/location_mentioned* to join *person_mentioned*Scott */person_mentioned*and run up for quantity*/p*
*p*The quarter League which *person_mentioned*Etherton */person_mentioned*paid for surveying has been chosen by *person_mentioned*McLairn */person_mentioned*who lives at *person_mentioned*R. Williams*/person_mentioned*, and he must pay *person_mentioned*Et[h]erton*/person_mentioned* who takes a quarter which *person_mentioned*Borden */person_mentioned*is to survey *location_mentioned*west of Colorado nearly opposite *person_mentioned*Kincheloes*/person_mentioned**/location_mentioned*, and perhaps you can make the arrangement with *person_mentioned*Borden */person_mentioned*but if so *person_mentioned*McLarn */person_mentioned*must pay you*/p*
*p*I am in want of the returns you have finished in fact all you have run*/p*
*p*My respects to *person_mentioned*Mrs Weightman*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*What does *person_mentioned*Cummins */person_mentioned*say about the *location_mentioned*quarter */location_mentioned*for *person_mentioned*Maria */person_mentioned*Tell *person_mentioned*McFarland */person_mentioned*that his title is ready for the League he applied for *location_mentioned*East of Colorado*/location_mentioned*, the one that *person_mentioned*king */person_mentioned*talked of taking—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*A*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
